scripts.test: npm run test:default && npm run test:flags && npm run test:config && npm run test:output && npm run test:bare && npm run test:coverage
scripts.test:coverage:report: nyc report --reporter=text-summary | grep -q "Statements   : 100% ( 8/8 )" || (echo Expected coverage not found && exit 1)
scripts.test:output: node ../../cli | grep -q "{ innerText: 'count is: 1' }" || (echo Expected output not found && exit 1)
